vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπουράνιος [ᾰ], ον,
Epic dialect η, ον [Refs 4th c.BC+]:— heavenly, in [NT+8th c.BC+]; ἡ ἐ. πορεία falsa lectio in [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 plural, as substantive, οἱ ἐ., ={θεοί}, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; opposed to ἐπίγειοι, [NT+2nd c.AD+]; τὰ ἐ., ={τὰ μετέωρα}, variant in [NT+5th c.BC+]
__3 up to heaven, ἔπτατ᾽ ἐπουρανίη variant in [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
heavenly, celestial; heavenly realms
heavenly, in respect of locality, Eph. 1:20; Phil. 2:10; τὰ ἐπουράνια, the upper regions, celestial of the air, Eph. 6:12; heavenly, in respect of essence and character, unearthly, 1Cor. 15:48, 49; metaphorically divine, spiritual, Jn. 3:12
vocabInfos._es_Definition: celestial (1CO.15:40) ; en el mundo celestial, en lugares celestiales (EFE.1:3, etc.)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 天上的, 天象的 (林前 15:30)
2) 屬天的, 在天上的
2a) 形容詞
2b) 實名詞
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 天上的, 天象的 (林前 15:30)
2) 属天的, 在天上的
2a) 形容词
2b) 实名词
